thread.title: Zafgen says FDA puts obesity drug trial on partial hold
thread.title_full: Zafgen says FDA puts obesity drug trial on partial hold | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Zafgen says FDA puts obesity drug trial on partial hold
text:
Oct 16 Drug developer Zafgen Inc said the U.S. Food and Drug Administration had put a late-stage trial of its obesity drug on partial hold after a patient died during the study.
A partial clinical hold is an order that the FDA issues to delay or suspend part of a company's clinical study. (Reporting by Amrutha Penumudi in Bengaluru; Editing by Don Sebastian)
